tool_description: Updates customer's loyalty point balance by adding newly earned points and maintaining transaction audit trail.

points_to_add.description: Number of points to add to balance

transaction_id.description: Reference transaction ID for audit trail

error_messages: Customer not found: Customer ID does not exist in the system.
Invalid points amount: points_to_add must be a positive integer.
Balance update failed: Unable to update customer point balance due to system error.
Invalid expiry date: expiry_date must be in ISO 8601 format and in the future.
Duplicate transaction: Points for this transaction ID have already been added.
usage: Provide customer ID, points to add, and transaction reference to update the customer's point balance. Optionally specify when points expire.

update_successful.description: Whether the balance update completed successfully
